long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A very simple productivity extension that allows you to set up a custom message and just click one button to automatically send a reply to a Gmail message. Perfect for responding to cold email messages and sending people to your Good Pigeon profile, or for any other type of message that you find yourself sending repeatedly.

Comes with the option to auto send (truly a one click response) or to put the message into your Gmail message editor and allow you to modify further and click send, like you would with Gmail canned response.
